data.title: Top German Newspapers For German Learners > Verbalplanet
data.meta_description: Improving your reading skills is a key part of learning German. So what are the best German newspapers for language learners. Our guide to the German press will help you practice your reading skills and discover German culture.
data.text:
Improving your reading skills is a key part of learning German. So what are the best German newspapers for language learners. Our guide to the German press will help you practice your reading skills and discover German culture.

Building up your reading skills is a key component of your overall level of fluency in German and it's essential if you plan to spend any time in a German speaking country. Not all German newspapers are suitable for all levels of ability, so we've grouped the top picks into their suitability for beginners, intermediate and advanced learners. If you know of a great resource for learning German, plese get in touch. Enjoy!
